org.wikipedia

Class Wiki.Revision

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wikipedia.Wiki.Revision
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Wiki.Revision>
    Enclosing class:
    Wiki

    public class Wiki.Revision
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Wiki.Revision>
    Represents a contribution and/or a revision to a page.
    Since:
    0.17

    • Constructor Detail

      • Revision

        public Revision(long revid,
                java.util.Calendar timestamp,
                java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String summary,
                java.lang.String user,
                boolean minor,
                boolean bot,
                boolean rvnew,
                int size)
        Constructs a new Revision object.
        Parameters:
        revid - the id of the revision (this is a long since {{NUMBEROFEDITS}} on en.wikipedia.org is now (January 2012) ~25% of Integer.MAX_VALUE
        timestamp - when this revision was made
        title - the concerned article
        summary - the edit summary
        user - the user making this revision (may be anonymous, if not use User.getUsername())
        minor - whether this was a minor edit
        bot - whether this was a bot edit
        rvnew - whether this revision created a new page
        size - the size of the revision
        Since:
        0.17

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Fetches the contents of this revision. WARNING: fails if the revision is deleted.
        Returns:
        the contents of the appropriate article at timestamp
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if page == Special:Log/xxx.
        Since:
        0.17

      • getRenderedText

        public java.lang.String getRenderedText()
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the rendered text of this revision. WARNING: fails if the revision is deleted.
        Returns:
        the rendered contents of the appropriate article at timestamp
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if page == Special:Log/xxx.
        Since:
        0.17

      • diff

        public java.lang.String diff(Wiki.Revision other)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a HTML rendered diff table; see the table at the example.
        Parameters:
        other - another revision on the same page.
        Returns:
        the difference between this and the other revision
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.21

      • diff

        public java.lang.String diff(java.lang.String text)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a HTML rendered diff table between this revision and the given text. Useful for emulating the "show changes" functionality. See the table at the example.
        Parameters:
        text - some wikitext
        Returns:
        the difference between this and the the text provided
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.21

      • diff

        public java.lang.String diff(long oldid)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a HTML rendered diff table; see the table at the example.
        Parameters:
        oldid - the oldid of a revision on the same page. NEXT_REVISION, PREVIOUS_REVISION and CURRENT_REVISION can be used here for obvious effect.
        Returns:
        the difference between this and the other revision
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.26

      • diff

        protected java.lang.String diff(long oldid,
                                java.lang.String text)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Fetches a HTML rendered diff table; see the table at the example.
        Parameters:
        oldid - the id of another revision; (exclusive) or
        text - some wikitext to compare against
        Returns:
        a difference between oldid or text or null if there is no diff (example: 586849481).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
        Since:
        0.21

      • isBot

        public boolean isBot()

        Returns:
        (see above)
        Since:
        0.23

      • isNew

        public boolean isNew()
        Determines whether this revision created a new page.
        WARNING: Will return false for all revisions prior to 2007 (I think?) -- this is a MediaWiki problem.
        WARNING: Returning true does not imply this is the bottommost revision on the page due to histmerges.
        WARNING: Not accessible through getPageHistory() -- a MW problem.
        Returns:
        (see above)
        Since:
        0.27

      • getSummary

        public java.lang.String getSummary()
        Returns the edit summary for this revision, or null if we cannot access it.
        Returns:
        the edit summary
        Since:
        0.17

      • isSummaryDeleted

        public boolean isSummaryDeleted()
        Returns true if the edit summary is RevisionDeleted.
        Returns:
        (see above)
        Since:
        0.30

      • getUser

        public java.lang.String getUser()
        Returns the user or anon who created this revision. You should pass this (if not an IP) to getUser(String) to obtain a User object. WARNING: returns null if the user was RevisionDeleted.
        Returns:
        the user or anon
        Since:
        0.17

      • setRcid

        public void setRcid(long rcid)
        Sets the rcid of this revision, used for patrolling. This parameter is optional. This is publicly editable for subclassing.
        Parameters:
        rcid - the rcid of this revision (long)
        Since:
        0.17

      • getRcid

        Parameters:

        Since:
        0.24

      • getRollbackToken

        public java.lang.String getRollbackToken()
        Gets the rollback token for this revision. Can be null, and often for good reasons: cannot rollback or not top revision.
        Returns:
        the rollback token
        Since:
        0.24

      • rollback

        public void rollback()
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
        Reverts this revision using the rollback method. See Wiki.rollback().
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
        javax.security.auth.login.CredentialNotFoundException - if not logged in or user is not an admin
        javax.security.auth.login.CredentialExpiredException - if cookies have expired
        javax.security.auth.login.AccountLockedException - if the user is blocked
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
        Since:
        0.19

      • rollback

        public void rollback(boolean bot,
                     java.lang.String reason)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
        Reverts this revision using the rollback method. See Wiki.rollback().
        Parameters:
        bot - mark this and the reverted revision(s) as bot edits
        reason - (optional) a custom reason
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
        javax.security.auth.login.CredentialNotFoundException - if not logged in or user is not an admin
        javax.security.auth.login.CredentialExpiredException - if cookies have expired
        javax.security.auth.login.AccountLockedException - if the user is blocked
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
        Since:
        0.19
